Collingwood has stamped itself as AFLW premiership favourites after disposing of a wayward Melbourne by 35 points.
Key points:
<ul><li>The Magpies are on top of the AFLW ladder with an unbeaten rec… [+6057 chars]

articles.author: MMA Fighting Newswire
articles.title: UFC Vegas 20 in Tweets: Fighters react to Ciryl Gane’s victory over Jairzinho Rozenstruik - MMA Fighting
articles.description: Fighters had a lot to say about UFC Vegas 20 on Saturday night at UFC APEX in Las Vegas.
articles.content:
Heading into the UFC Vegas 20 main event, fans were ready for some serious heavyweight action between two top prospects.
